description: Galveston building fragility specific for hurricane surge
authors: Tomiczek, T. Kennedy, A, and Rogers, S.
creator: cwang138

fragilityCurves.description: new schema proposed for parametric fragility curves

fragilityCurveParameters.name: surgeLevel
fragilityCurveParameters.description: surge level (m) coming from hazard data

fragilityCurveParameters.name: waveHeight
fragilityCurveParameters.description: Significant wave height (m) coming from hazard data

fragilityCurveParameters.name: LHSM
fragilityCurveParameters.description: Elevation of the lowest horizontal structural member (ft) coming from building inventory

fragilityCurveParameters.name: age_group
fragilityCurveParameters.description: Age group of the building (1,2,3, and 4 representing age group pre-1974, 1974–1987, 1987–1995, and 1995– 2008, respectively) coming from building Inventory

fragilityCurveParameters.name: G_elev
fragilityCurveParameters.description: Elevation of the building with respect to the ground (m) coming from building inventory
